== Installation of Ubuntu MID ==

=== Starting the Live Session ===

# Copy the image onto a USB stick with dd or usb-imagewriter
# Configure the target device to boot from USB
# Select "Try Ubuntu MID without any changes" from the boot menu

=== Running the Installer ===

# Select the "Preferences" pane from the launcher
# Select "Install
# Once Ubiquity starts, select "Forward"
# Pick a language, and select "Forward"
# Configure your timezone, and select "Forward"
# Verify your keyboard layout, and select "Forward"
# Choose "Guided - use entire disk" and select "Forward"
# Verify the installation details, and select "Install"
# When installation is complete, select "Restart the system now"

=== Installed System Verification ===

# Configure the target device to boot from the installed disk
# Verify the startup sequence, and that the launcher opens on startup
